classData.comment:
/**
 * The base module to enhance classes, create instances and the Neo namespace
 * @module Neo
 * @singleton
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.bindMethods       as bindMethods
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.capitalize        as capitalize
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.createStyleObject as createStyleObject
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.createStyles      as createStyles
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.decamel           as decamel
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.isArray           as isArray
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.isBoolean         as isBoolean
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.isDefined         as isDefined
 * @borrows Neo.core.Compare.isEqual        as isEqual
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.isNumber          as isNumber
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.isObject          as isObject
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.isString          as isString
 * @borrows Neo.core.Util.toArray           as toArray
 * @tutorial 01_Concept
 */
classData.description: The base module to enhance classes, create instances and the Neo namespace
classData.name: Neo

classData.comment:
/**
     * A map containing ntypes as key and Neo classes or singletons as values
     * @memberOf! module:Neo
     * @protected
     * @type Object
     */
classData.description: A map containing ntypes as key and Neo classes or singletons as values
classData.name: ntypeMap

classData.comment:
/**
     * Needed for Neo.create. False for the main thread, true for the App, Data & Vdom worker
     * @memberOf! module:Neo
     * @protected
     * @type Boolean
     */
classData.description: Needed for Neo.create. False for the main thread, true for the App, Data & Vdom worker
classData.name: insideWorker

classData.comment:
/**
     * Maps methods from one namespace to another one
     * @example
     * // aliases
     * Neo.applyFromNs(Neo, Util, {
     *     createStyleObject: 'createStyleObject',
     *     createStyles     : 'createStyles',
     *     capitalize       : 'capitalize'
     * }, true);
     *
     * // e.g. Neo.core.Util.isObject => Neo.isObject
     * @memberOf module:Neo
     * @param {Neo|Neo.core.Base} target    The target class or singleton Instance or Neo
     * @param {Neo.core.Base}     namespace The class containing the methods
     * @param {Object}            config
     * @param {Boolean}           [bind]    set this to true in case you want to bind methods to the "from" namespace
     * @returns {Object} target
     */
classData.description: Maps methods from one namespace to another one

params.description: The target class or singleton Instance or Neo
params.name: target

params.description: The class containing the methods
params.name: namespace

params.description: set this to true in case you want to bind methods to the "from" namespace
params.name: bind

classData.name: applyFromNs

classData.comment:
/**
     * Maps a class to the global Neo or App namespace.
     * Can get called for classes and singleton instances
     * @memberOf module:Neo
     * @param {Neo.core.Base} cls
     */
classData.description: Maps a class to the global Neo or App namespace. Can get called for classes and singleton instances
classData.name: applyToGlobalNs

classData.comment:

     * @returns {Object} target
     */

classData.comment:
/**
     * Assigns a new value to a given nested objects path.
     * It will create the path structure or parts of it, in case it does not exist.
     * @example
     * Neo.assignToNs('annotations.selected', false, record)
     *
     * @memberOf module:Neo
     * @param {String[]|String} path             The path string containing dots or an Array of the string parts
     * @param {*}               value            The new value to assign to the leaf node
     * @param {Object}          scope=globalThis Set a different starting point as globalThis
     * @param {Boolean}         force=true       false will only assign default values (assign if old value === undefined)
     */
classData.description: Assigns a new value to a given nested objects path. It will create the path structure or parts of it, in case it does not exist.

params.description: The path string containing dots or an Array of the string parts
params.name: path

params.description: The new value to assign to the leaf node
params.name: value

params.description: Set a different starting point as globalThis
params.name: scope

params.description: false will only assign default values (assign if old value === undefined)
params.name: force

classData.name: assignToNs
